name: Associated Banc-Corp
description: Associated Banc-Corp is a regional bank holding company based in Green Bay, Wisconsin, serving customers primarily in the Midwest region of the United States. Founded in 1970, the company operates through its banking subsidiary, Associated Bank, which provides a full range of financial services, including retail and commercial banking, wealth management, and capital markets. Associated Bank is committed to delivering personalized banking experiences, leveraging technology to enhance customer service while maintaining a local presence. The bank's offerings include checking and savings accounts, loans, mortgages, investment services, and treasury management solutions tailored to meet the diverse needs of individuals, businesses, and institutions. Known for its strong community focus, Associated Banc-Corp actively engages in community development initiatives and sustainable business practices. The company aims to foster economic growth and improve the quality of life in the communities it serves, positioning itself as a trusted financial partner. As a publicly traded company on the New York Stock Exchange, Associated Banc-Corp is dedicated to transparency, accountability, and delivering value to its shareholders.

key_executives.name: Andrew W. E. F. H. H. L. D. M. W. D. E. D. H. H. W. E. A.

faq.answer: Associated Banc-Corp offers a variety of services including retail banking, commercial banking, and wealth management.

faq.answer: Associated Banc-Corp is headquartered in Green Bay, Wisconsin, USA.
